alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:03PM EDT until July 10 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Iron County in south central Upper Michigan... Northern Dickinson County in south central Upper Michigan... West central Marquette County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/. * At 603 PM EDT/503 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Amasa, or 15 miles north of Crystal Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Squaw Lake, Amasa, U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, Witch Lake, Republic, Silver Lake near Channing, Big Bass Lake and Bone Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
